title: Goblinbane Dagger
content:
oing: Goblins have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against the wielder.

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

'No goblin will strike you down' is etched into this dagger's handle. When goblin assailants realised they couldn't kill the dagger's original owner, they gave him to the worgs, who made short work of him.

Dagger Light Finesse Thrown

Goblinbane Dagger (Renamed to Worgfang in final release) is one of the Dagger Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Goblinbane Dagger is an enchanted dagger tha
